swivel_leg.description: Swivel the revolute leg of the scissors for a functionality check.

wipe_then_rotate_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the scissors and then rotate it as a maintenance practice.

operate_leg.description: Operate the revolute leg of the scissors by rotating it.

rotate_leg_up_and_down.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the scissors up and down for a functionality check.

press_then_rotate_leg.description: Press the revolute leg of the scissors and then rotate it as part of a functionality check.

rotate_revolute_leg.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the scissors as part of a functionality check.

press_and_rotate_leg.description: Press and then rotate the movable leg of the scissors as part of a functionality check.

move_leg.description: Move the revolute leg of the scissors back and forth.

clean_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the scissors to remove dust or stains.

rotate_leg_back_and_forth.description: Rotate the moveable leg of the scissors back and forth to check its functioning.

general_revolute_leg.description: Press the revolute leg of the scissors then rotate it.

clean_leg_with_cloth.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors using a cloth to remove dust or stains.

inspect_leg.description: Inspect the fixed leg of the scissors to ensure it's in good working order.

polish_leg.description: Polish the fixed leg of the scissors to maintain its shine and cleanliness.

clean_fixed_leg_then_press.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors to free it from dust, then press it to check its functionality.

touch_fixed_leg.description: Touch the fixed leg of the scissors for familiarization.

polish_fixed_leg.description: Polish the fixed leg of the scissors for better appearance and use.

press_on_leg.description: Press on the fixed leg of the scissors as part of a functionality check.

touch_leg.description: Touch the fixed leg of the scissors.

clean_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors to remove dust or stains.

general_fixed_leg.description: Perform a gentle wipe of the scissor's fixed leg.

polish_then_check_fixed_leg.description: Polish the fixed leg of the scissors, then check its functionality.

rotate_then_wipe_revolute_leg.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the scissors, then wipe it to maintain its cleanliness.

maintain_scissors.description: Rotate the revolute leg, clean both legs of the scissors to ensure they're free from dust.

polish_then_press_revolving_leg.description: Polish the revolving leg of the scissors for better use, then press it as a functionality check.

rotate_then_clean_revolute_leg.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the scissors, then clean it to ensure it is free from dust and other particles.

clean_both_legs.description: Ensure both legs of the scissors are clean and free of dust or stains.

clean_and_press_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors and then press it to check its functionality.

clean_then_rotate_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the scissors and then rotate it to check its functionality.

clean_scissors.description: Clean both legs of the scissors to ensure they are free from dust and other particles.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors to remove stains or any other particles.

clean_both_legs_differently.description: Clean both the legs of the scissors differently to maintain them.

operation_on_both_legs_1.description: Press the revolute leg than clean both legs.

operation_on_both_legs_2.description: Press both legs of the scissors.

operation_on_both_legs_3.description: Clean the fixed leg and rotate the revolute leg.

rotate_leg.description: Rotate the moveable leg of the scissors.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_both_legs.description: Clean both legs of the scissors to ensure they are free from dust and other particles.
